meanings.sent1: The penates were believed to watch over the home.
meanings.sent2: Every family had their own penates to protect them.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat was jokingly called the penates of the house.
meanings.sent4: The penates whispered secrets to the walls of the ancient home.
meanings.sent5: The penates were said to bring good luck to those who honored them.

meanings.definition: The gods or spirits of the household.
meanings.sent1: In Roman mythology, the penates were revered as important deities.
meanings.sent2: Offerings were made to the penates during special ceremonies.
meanings.sent3: The children playfully pretended to be the penates of the family.
meanings.sent4: The penates seemed to bless the household with harmony and peace.
meanings.sent5: The penates were said to reside in the hearth of the home.

meanings.definition: The protective spirits of a household.
meanings.sent1: The penates were thought to shield the family from harm.
meanings.sent2: Legends spoke of the penates guiding lost travelers back home.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog was jokingly called the penates of the family.
meanings.sent4: The penates were like invisible guardians watching over the household.
meanings.sent5: The penates were believed to bring blessings to those who respected them.
